A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Absolutely horrible. Disappointing reveals. How do you take theee most talked about questions of the last two years and completely  destroy their hype?? They could have gone in literally any other direction but chose the most boring story. 

They relied tooooo much on CGI\, cute animals\, and worthless action rather than story and plot. Hate the prequels all you want\, but at least they were multidimensional - action\, romance\, comedy\, cliffhangers. 

Terrible.
